attributes.text:
Basic runtime detection for qooxdoo.

This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

Checks for the name of the runtime and returns it. In general, it checks for rhino and node.js and if that could not be detected, it falls back to the browser name defined by {@link qx.bom.client.Browser#getName}.
